body.p:
UTGS library is compound of Useless, KooLib & Dynamo sub-libraries. Useless is main sub-library, while others are built on top of it. Useless library provides wide variety of components. There are several concepts:
Useless.Filefile access components: IFile, OFile, IFileStream, IFileSystem, VIFS.
Useless.Graphiccomponents related to graphics.
Useless.Soundcomponents related to sound.
Useless.GUIcomponents related to graphic user interface.
Useless.Moviecomponents related to audio & video streaming.
Useless.XMLcomponents related to XML: XMLParser, Resources.
Useless.Graphic components are divided into such groups:
Useless.Graphic.Devicedevice dependent image components: Surface, Screen.
Useless.Graphic.Planesdevice independent image components: IGraphics, OGraphics.
Useless.Graphic.Transferabstract pixel copying components: PixelTransfer.
Useless.Graphic.Pixelutility pixel traits components: PixelType*, CopyPixels, Dither, GenericPixelPtr.
Useless.Graphic.FileIOimage (de)serialization components: ImageLoader, ImageSaver.
Useless.Sound components are divided into such groups:
Useless.Sounddevice independent sound components: Sample, Channel.
Useless.Sound.Devicedevice dependent sound components: SoundCard, SampleData.
Useless.Sound.FileIOwave (de)serialization components: WaveLoader, WaveSaver.
Useless.GUI components are divided into such groups:
Useless.GUI.DisplayGUI display control components: DisplayMan, HintMan, WidgetPainter, TablePainter, MouseCursor.
Useless.GUI.Logicwidget behavior components: LogicWidget, MultiItemLogic, TextEditLogic.
Useless.GUI.Skinswidget appearance components: Skin, SkinMan, ArraySkin, FontSkin.
Useless.GUI.Textcomponents related to text & font.
Useless.GUI.Relationscomponents for making relations between widgets.
Useless.GUI.Widgetswidget components.

The module defines interfaces:
Useless.IFilefile for reading.
Useless.OFilefile for writting.
Useless.IFileStreaminput file stream compilant with std::istream. Works good with std::getline(), and also works nicely with operator <<.
Useless.IFileSystemfactory component creating file interfaces.

Useless.IFile has following implementations:
Useless.StdIFilestandard file component using fopen().
Useless.CryptoIFileproxy component to other file, providing encryption.
Useless.MemIFilefile kept in memory.
Useless.SubIFileproxy component to some part of other file. NOT thread safe.
Useless.HatchedIFileproxy component to file packed in Hatchery. NOT thread safe.

Useless.OFile has following implementations:
Useless.StdOFilestandard file component using fopen().
Useless.CryptoOFileproxy component to other file, providing encryption.
Useless.MemOFilefile kept in memory.

Useless.IFileSystem has following implementations:
Useless.StdIFileSystemfactory component creating Useless.StdIFile components.
Useless.Hatcheryfactory component creating Useless.HatchedIFile components.
Useless.VIFS.Instance()singleton factory capable of mounting Useless.IFileSystem components.

The module defines interfaces:
Useless.IGraphicsdevice independent blit source.
Useless.OGraphicsdevice independent blit target.
Useless.Screenblit device attached to system window.
Useless.Surfacedevice dependent pixel storage.
Useless.Painterdevice independent painter.
Useless.SurfacePainterdevice dependent painter.
Useless.PixelTransfercomponent providing means to copy pixels to/from Useless.Surface.
Useless.ImageLoadercomponent providing means to fetch pixels from Useless.IFile.
Useless.ImageSavercomponent providing means to store pixels into Useless.OFile.

Useless.IGraphics has following implementations:
Useless.Imagecomponent loads pixels from file ignoring any alpha information.
Useless.TransparentImagecomponent loads color-pixels from one file and alpha-pixels from another file. Both first and second files may be the same.
Useless.Animationcomponent usefull for static animations. All subsequent frames must: be of same size, lay in one image, and be placed one after another horizontally in correct order.
Useless.ImageBuffercomponent which may be the blit target and blit source. Implemented only for DirectDraw Device.

Useless.OGraphics has folowing implementations:
Useless.Screenblit target bound to system window.
Useless.ImageBuffercomponent which may be the blit target and blit source. Implemented only for DirectDraw Device.

Useless.PixelTransfer has following implementations:
Useless.GenericPixelTransfercomponent applies convertions between several pixel formats, with or witout dithering.
Useless.GDITransfercomponent optimized for device Useless.Graphic.Device.winGDI.

Useless.ImageLoader has following implementations:
Useless.BMPLoaderloads window bitmap.
Useless.TGALoaderloads truevision image.

Useless.ImageSaver has following implementations:
Useless.BMPSaverwrites window bitmap.
Useless.TGASaverwrites truevision image.

The module defines interfaces:
Useless.Sampledevice independent sound buffer.
Useless.SampleDatadevice dependent sound sample storage.
Useless.SoundCardsound device.
Useless.Channelsound playback control.
Useless.MultiChannelsound channel manager.
Useless.Notenote frequency calculator.
Useless.SoundLoadercomponent providing means to fetch samples from Useless.IFile.
Useless.SoundSavercomponent providing means to store samples into Useless.OFile.

Useless.Sample has following implementations:
Useless.SampleFileload sound file data into sound sample storage.
Useless.BasicSamplejust a sound buffer.

Useless.SoundLoader has following implementations:
Useless.WaveLoaderloads wav files into sound sample storage.

Useless.SoundSaver has following implementations:
Useless.WaveSaverwrites sound sample data into wav files.

The module defines interafaces:
General:
Useless.Widgetelemenary GUI element. Widgets form tree relationship. Each children widget is clipped by its parent to assigned area (i.e. Useless.FrameWidget assigns its children his own area belittled by border margins, however Useless.WidgetTableWidget assigns each child only the area inside table cell assigned to that child).
Useless.Workspacethe root of GUI, and kind of Useless.Form. It contains 4 layers: desktop, popups, menus, and hints.
Useless.WidgetEnvironmenteach Useless.Widget knows one environment, where it may access Useless.Screen, Useless.Workspace and Useless.Form.
Useless.WidgetIteratorcomponent is created by each Useless.Widget to iterate among all its children.
Useless.GUIMasterlinks Useless.Screen & Useless.Workspace.
Useless.DisplayMancomponent that controls proper GUI display. It refreshes dirty regions & redirects user input to GUI.
Useless.Formcomponent that manages keyboard focus. Forms buid tree relationship.
Useless.HintMancomponent that summons GUI hints.
Useless.WidgetPaintera painter that keeps additional information about widget being painted.
Useless.TablePaintera painter used to repaint table cells with data.
Useless.MouseCursorcomponent that controls graphic shape of a pointer, and pointer move limits.
Widget Categories:
Useless.CompoundWidgeta widget that has children.
Useless.ActiveWidgeta widget that translates input events into plenty signals (i.e. OnClick, OnKeyPress).
Useless.EnumWidgeta widget that allows selection of one item. Selected item is identified by index number.
Behavior:
Useless.LogicWidgetabstract utility class, used to separate widget's appearance from behavior.
Useless.MultiItemLogicabstract utility class, used to separate widget's appearance from behavior. It concerns widgets with several items, such as list or table.
Useless.TextEditLogicabstract utility class, used to separate widget's appearance from behavior. It concerns widgets with text input, such as Useless.TextField.
Appearance:
Useless.Skinabstract thing that may be painted using Useless.Painter. It is used to set widget's appearance. Treat this component just like it was some kind of generated image.
Useless.SkinManabstract container for Useless.Skin components. It doesn't have to be the real container (i.e. Useless.SkinMixer isn't). It just have to act like it was him.
Useless.ArraySkinabstract kind of Useless.Skin component with feature of painting lines among subsequent rows, and lines among subsequent columns.
Useless.FontSkincomponent defining the appearance & metrics of font.
Text:
Useless.Texta kind of std::basic_string< wchar_t > with additional formatting features.
Useless.Fontcomponent defining font. It is a handle for Useless.FontSkin.

Useless.DisplayMan has following implementations:
ScreenManpaints widgets on Useless.Screen.
OffscreenManpaints widgets on Useless.ImageBuffer.

Useless.HintMan has following implementations:
Hintssimple hints (default choice). A frame with text inside.
SkinnedHintsadvanced hints.

Useless.MouseCursor has following implementations:
Useless.ImageCursoruse Useless.IGraphics as shape of pointer.

Useless.Skin has following implementations:
Useless.ImageSkinstretched image.
Useless.BarSkinnerimage repeated several times in one direction. Source image is tossed into 4 sub-images, to obtain head, center, diamond and tail.
Useless.FrameSkinimage repeated several times in both directions. Source image is tossed into 9 sub-images, to obtain 4 corrners, 4 borders and center.
Useless.CaptionSkindraw text with font.
Useless.NullSkinnop skin.
Useless.ParametricSkinkind of algorithmic Useless.ArraySkin with plenty of parameters. This skin is painted from lines and recatangles.
Useless.SizerSkinkind of Useless.ArraySkin, painted via image repetition technique. Source image is tossed into 12 sub-images, to obtain 4 borders, 4 corrners, 3 parts of cell division line.
Useless.TableSkinkind of Useless.ArraySkin, painted via image repetition technique. Source image is tossed into 16 sub-images, to obtain 4 borders, 4 corrners, 3 parts of column division line, 3 parts of row division line.

Useless.SkinMan has following implementations:
Useless.ImageDicertoss image into many sub-images following rows and columns count.
Useless.ImageDotTracertoss image into many sub-images following special pixel marks.
Useless.SkinSetreal container for Useless.Skin components.
Useless.SkinMixerskin manager that combines multiple source skins into several virtual skins.

Useless.FontSkin has following implementations:
Useless.FacedFontcut letters from image. This skin is painted as is on source image. No scalling is applied.
Useless.AlphaFontcut letters from image alpha channel. This skin is capable of colouring. No scalling is applied.

Useless.Widget has following implementations:
Active widgets with graphics:
Useless.ButtonWidgetgraphic button without caption. An active widget with bound graphic representation.
Useless.DraggerWidgetkind of graphic button. Use for elements that may be dragged, like grip in slider or scrollbar.
Useless.MarkWidgetkind of graphic button. Use for checkmarks.
Useless.RadioWidgetkind of graphic button. Use for radio buttons.
Useless.SwitchWidgetkind of graphic button. Use for buttons that remains in pressed/released state.
Useless.TabWidgetkind of graphic button. Use for tab activators.
Useless.TriggerWidgetgraphic button. Use for elements like titlebars.
Useless.IconButtongraphic button with icon.
Active widgets with caption:
Useless.CaptionButtonclick-button with graphic box and caption. It works like a mouse button.
Useless.CaptionMarkcheck-button with graphic box and caption. Check-button may be checked and unchecked. Use it for checkmarks.
Useless.CaptionRadioradio-button with graphic box and caption. Radio-button once marked may not be unmarked. Use it for radio-buttons.
Useless.CaptionSwitchswitch-button with graphic box and caption. Like check-button with sight difference in behavior. Use it for buttons that remain pressed.
Useless.CaptionTabtab-button with graphic box and caption. Like radio-button with slight difference in behavior. Use it for tab activators.
Useless.CaptionTrigertrigger-button with graphic box and caption. Like radio-button with slight difference in behavior. Use it for popup titlebars.
Active widgets with selectable items:
Useless.ListWidgetwidget with several text items listed one below other.
Useless.AdvListWidgetwidget compound of list, frame and scrollbar.
Useless.MenuWidgeta list in frame that may appear in workspace's menus layer.
Useless.TableLista table with one selectable row. It may also contain one widget per each cell.
Useless.DropDowndrop-down-button. It is bound to a list or a table. When pressed shows bound widget and after user changes selected item, the content of drop-down-button is updated.
Useless.ListMenua kind of Useless.DropDown with bound list.
Useless.TableMenua kind of Useless.DropDown with bound table, with one selectable row.
Widgets with table look:
Useless.TableWidgetwidget that paints just a table.
Useless.WidgetTableWidgeta table that may contain one widget per each cell.
Useless.DataTableWidgetwidget connecting table with data source.
Useless.TableSystemWidgetwidget compound of table, column headers, and scrollbars.
Useless.AdvTableSystemWidgetwidget compound of table, column headers, and scrollbars. Columns and column headers are set automatically.
Widgets that scroll widgets:
Useless.AdvScrollbarWidgetwidget compound of Useless.ScrollbarWidget and scroll buttons.
Useless.ScrollbarWidgetcontrols Useless.ScrolledWidget. Size of grip is proportional to viewed part. Supports mouse-wheel.
Useless.ScrolledWidgetview pane. It controls which rectangular portion of bound widget is visible.
Widgets with text:
Useless.TextWidgetsingle line label. Size of this widget is defined by font height and text length.
Useless.AdvTextWidgetwidget that paints aligned text. It has ability to wrap lines. Height of this widget is defiend by text height.
Useless.CreditsWidgetcredits scroller.
Useless.DualTextWidgetwidget that paints 2 texts separated by several . characters. Usefull for highscores.
Widgets with text input:
Useless.TextFieldthe single line input field.
Useless.NumericFieldan input field allowing number input only.
Widget containers:
Useless.HubWidgetwidget containing widgets.
Useless.FrameWidgeta special case of Useless.HubWidget with skin.
Other widgets:
Useless.ActiveAreaWidgetwidget derives signals from Useless.ActiveWidget and adds OnPaint signal. Use it to create custom widget at runtime.
Useless.ImageWidgetjust an image.
Useless.GraphWidgetwidget that plots data graph.
Useless.LoomWidgetwidget that pulls open bound widget.
Useless.ProgressBar2 skins, one used for backdrop frame, and other as progress indicator.
Useless.SliderWidgetwidget used to adjust value in discrete range. Grip has fixed size.
Useless.Popupspecial widget with titlebar and bound content. It appers in workspace's popups layer.

The module defines components:
Useless.DSMediaplay movie using Microsoft Direct Show filters. Image is rendered onto Useless.Surface, and sound is rednered via Useless.SoundCard.
Useless.OggVorbisDecoderplay Ogg/Vorbis streams from Useless.IFile, thru Useless.SoundCard.
Useless.MoviePlayerhigh-level fullscreen movie player.

The module defines components:
Useless.CreateFromXML()global XML factory function. It will parse XML string, and apply deep scan function on resultant XML tree, which fires functions registered by node names.
Useless.CreateFromXMLFile()global XML factory function. First it reads whole file to memory, and then works same as Useless.CreateFromXML().
Useless.RegisterXMLCreatorclass used to register supplied function automatically via inclusion of header file.
Useless.ResourceQuery< _Type >class used to obtain resource of given type _Type.
Useless.WidgetResource< _Type >class used to obtain resource of given widget type _Type.
Useless.ImageResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.ImageBase >.
Useless.SkinResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.Skin >.
Useless.SkinManResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.SkinMan >.
Useless.FontResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.Font.
Useless.FontSetResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.FontSet.
Useless.SoundCardResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.SoundCard >.
Useless.SampleResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.Sample >.
Useless.ScreenResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.Screen>.
Useless.GUIMasterResourceclass used to obtain resource of type Useless.SPointer< Useless.GUIMaster >.
Useless.MakeTextclass used to get text. It tries to get Useless.Text from resources. In case of failure name of text is used instead of real resource.
Useless.MakeImageclass used to get image. It tries to get Useless.SPointer< Useless.ImageBase > from resources. In case of failure new image is being created and added to resources, and then used instead of real resource. This function also gives possibility to create new image from rectangular part of the existing one (i.e. Useless::MakeImage("myImage(48,48,100,32)");).
